Text: PL Reforecast CE July to December Cc reforecast we went through after Q resulted in a reduced expense base of m for the year This is still short of our target of m to m As you are aware we reforecast our expenses on a quarterly basis and for Q I want you to work with your management accountant to produce the below pack by June th Management accounting will critic the packs and provide a detailed analysis of overs and unders to the Office of the Chair If necessary meetings will be held with you and the Office of the Chair to go through your numbers in detail If you have any questions about the below please contact Stephen Wood or your management accountant who should be contacting you shortly to discuss
